ygData.subject: FW: Qeynos & Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes there is a secret enterance to freeport. You walk into a section of wall that is indistinguishable from the rest (except you can walk through it). There is
ygData.messageBody:
Yes there is a secret enterance to freeport. You walk into a section of wall
that is indistinguishable from the rest (except you can walk through it).
There is a series of tunnels underneath that go throughout all three
freeports. It is found in East freeport. I have 2 loc's written down, don't
remember which. (-356.70, -93.32) and (-893.84, -1253.82). It might be
easier to find by creating a human character in freeport and following it
out. The exit is under the docks to the south. You go down the stairs, under
the dock and in the corner by the fisherman you will mfind a door. Go into
this warehous, down the stairs and under the stairs. Under the stairs you
will find anot her secret door (cant be seen, just walk into the wall).

I am now a level 16 Sk and have killed every orc I could (for a while in
Crushbone and then in the commonlands). I am now able to walk the streets of
Eastern and Western Freeport unmolested (the guards con as Dubious). I was
only attacked by a Mage NPC by one of the zones to East Freeport. North
Freeport (where the bank is) should be a little Dicer though as the Paladins
live there.

Sthiel
Cazic-Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: blademaster@... [mailto:blademaster@...]
Sent: Sunday, July 18, 1999 3:05 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Qeynos & Freeport


From: blademaster@...

In regards to the Kerra Isle quest, I have seen Dark Elves standing in the
bank in Qeynos (with another of my characters), so it is possible. I don't
know how many gnolls you have to kill, but I am guessing quite a few. As
far as the docks, that may be another matter, I haven't attempted it....
For Freeport, is there anyone else out there aware that in the
sewers/aqueducts underneath Freeport that there is a group of evil charactes
down there, and it is possible to get some quests from them? I have done
two of them, minor things really, and was wondering if anyone else had any
others from below Freeport and if they were worth it? If anyone else is
interested, i can give you details of what I know..... will have to dig out
my notes, though. Tvar Povar
